thread.title: Queen of South 1-4 Livingston: Match Report
thread.title_full: Queen of South 1-4 Livingston: Match Report

title: Queen of South 1-4 Livingston: Match Report
text: Queen of South 1-4 Livingston: Match Report 24 Oct 2015 18:01:00 Livingston record comfortable win over Queen of the SouthLivingston recorded a handsome 4-1 win at Queen of the South, despite falling behind.Dale Hilson drilled the hosts in front (27) with a close-range poke past Marc McCallum, with much credit to Jordan Marshall for the pinpoint cross.Livi pulled themselves level five after the break. Jordan White floated in a free-kick, and Scott Pitman controlled and netted superbly past Robbie Thomson.White then put Mark Burchill's side ahead, heading home from a Gary Glen centre with 23 minutes left.The same two men combined to set up Liam Buchanan for a chance, and he made no mistake, turning and beating Thomson expertly.Buchanan nodded home from a corner to complete the Doonhamers' misery with five minutes remaining.
